a:hover{background-color:#fff;color:#e67e22}.section__footer{background-image:linear-gradient(180deg,rgba(0,0,0,.7),rgba(0,0,0,.4)),url(00e843b70362e5c839c9ee6197f8118f.jpg);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:50% 70%;background-size:cover;min-height:50vh;display:grid;grid-template-areas:". footer__main ." "footer__street footer__main item4" ". footer__main .";justify-items:center;align-items:center}.section__footer>.footer__main{display:grid;grid-template-rows:1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr;grid-area:footer__main;grid-row-gap:20px;margin-top:20px;justify-self:center;margin-left:-60px}.section__footer>.footer__main>.copyright{margin-top:30px;color:#fff;justify-self:center}.section__footer>.footer__main hr:before{content:"";display:block;position:absolute;right:0;max-width:100%;width:100%}.section__footer>.footer__main .socialMedia .fa{font-size:18px;border:1px solid #fff;padding:10px;border-radius:50%;margin:0 5px;color:#fff}.section__footer>.footer__main .fa-facebook{background-color:#1877f2}.section__footer>.footer__main .fa-twitter{background-color:#1da1f2}.section__footer>.footer__main .fa-youtube{background-color:red}.section__footer>.footer__main .fa-instagram{background-color:#c32aa3}.section__footer>.footer__main h1{color:#fff}.section__footer>.footer__main input{border:1px solid #fff;border-radius:50px;background:#fff;opacity:.7;padding:5px 5px 5px 8px}.section__footer>.footer__street{grid-area:footer__street;color:#fff;letter-spacing:1px}.section__footer>.item3{grid-area:item3}.section__footer>.item4{grid-area:item4;color:#fff}.section__footer .grid-container{width:100%;height:100%;grid-template-rows:repeat(3,1fr);grid-template-columns:repeat(3,1fr)}.inputInside{position:relative}.inputInside button{position:absolute;background-color:#e67e22;border:transparent;color:#fff;cursor:pointer;font-size:.8rem;right:0;border-radius:50%;height:30px;width:30px}.nav--sticky{background-color:#353b48;z-index:1000;opacity:1;position:fixed;top:0;width:100%}@media only screen and (max-width:1200px){.nav__menu{font-size:1rem;letter-spacing:0}.nav__menu a{margin:1.8rem}.main__title h1{font-size:2.5rem}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){.nav__menu--show{transform:translateX(0)!important;opacity:1!important}.nav__hamburger{display:block!important;justify-self:end}.nav>.container{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr}.main>.container{margin:0;width:100%}.nav__menu{transform:translateX(100%);opacity:0;position:absolute;height:100vh;right:0;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;background:#fff;transition:all .3s;z-index:3;width:40%}.nav__menu a{color:#999;cursor:pointer}.section__gallery{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;grid-template-rows:1fr 1fr}}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.section__gallery{grid-template-columns:1fr;grid-template-rows:1fr}.footer__street{font-size:.7rem;width:50%;justify-self:center}.item4{font-size:1rem;width:60%;justify-self:center}}
